Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, north of Evander's Weapons Plaza.
Room.LongDescription: There is a large center dedicated towards the manufacturing and sales of weapons and other collectables to the south. It appears that the main entrance to the plaza is to the east along Netherworld Lane. There is a large, empty field on the north side of the road. You can see a number of druids and bards enjoying the day on the grass.
